name: Derpy & The Hunting of the super tasty Muffin (of Awesomeness)
name_original: Derpy & The Hunting of the super tasty Muffin (of Awesomeness)
description:
Derpy and The Hunting of the super tasty Muffin (of awesomeness) is a totally crazy and colorful graphic textadventure with retro music, sounds and a lot of derpiness.

You play Derpy and find a mysterious recipe for THE SUPER TASTY MUFFIN (OF AWESOMENESS). Now it's your turn to help Derpy to find all the ingredients.
Besides the main plot there's a lot of crazy stuff you can do. You can discover easter eggs, try to find Spike or go for trophy hunting!
